title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 411.1 - Medical care; arbitration of medical and hospital bills; podiatry care; chiropractic care; psychology care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 411.1 - Medical care; arbitration of medical and hospital bills; podiatry care; chiropractic care; psychology care

State Regulations

All rules and procedures of the chair, relating to medical
and surgical treatment, the arbitration of medical bills, the arbitration of
hospital bills, the practice of podiatry, the practice of chiropractic, and the
practice of psychology under the Workers' Compensation Law, are hereby made
applicable to the treatment and care of injured ambulance workers under the

Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law, to the extent that such rules and
procedures are not inconsistent with the Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
411.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
